sentences.en: And then you shall validate for yourself your own gifts of telepathy and clairvoyance!
sentences.cn: 而随后你会验证自己心灵感应和透视的天赋!

sentences.en: CLAIMS of clairvoyance, particularly when they come from economists, deserve a sceptical reception.
sentences.cn: 人们具有预见能力的这一说, 尤其是经济学家的预见能力通常都会引起质疑.

sentences.en: Mr Kaku identifies just perpetual - motion machines and clairvoyance as being truly beyond the realm of possibility.
sentences.cn: 在Kaku看来,只有永动机和超级视觉属于此不可能之类.

sentences.en: No matter what from clairvoyance and character feel aspect say is incomparable and its simple alive.
sentences.cn: 无论从透视学或质感来说是无与匹敌的简直是活了.

sentences.en: Power Component : Chronolily Nectar A chronolily nectar can be harvested to brew a potion of clairvoyance.
sentences.cn: 法术材料:时 光百合的花蜜可将收获的时光百合的花蜜用于酿制一副天眼术药剂.

sentences.en: Precognition is a form of clairvoyance.
sentences.cn: 预知是超人的洞察力的一种形式。

sentences.en: Some are: clairvoyance , clairaudience, astral projection, telepathy, anima , and there are many more.
sentences.cn: 它们是: 超视力 、 超听力 、 星体投射 、 心灵感应 、 灵力等等.

sentences.en: Such information includes clairvoyance, telepathy, and modalities of channeling soul through form.
sentences.cn: 这类信息包括透视力 、 心灵感应及透过身体与灵魂通讯的特征.

sentences.en: The military initially focused on 'remote viewing', the scientific term for clairvoyance and extrasensory perception (or ESP).
sentences.cn: 军方最初致力于开发“遥视”能力，这是千里眼和超感知觉的科学术语（或称ESP）。

trans.tran_en: the alleged power of perceiving things beyond the natural range of the senses
